content:
Generated SQL:
View SQL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customers;

1 rows returned.
How many orders has been placed?

Generated SQL:
View SQL
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM sales;

1 rows returned.
Show me the list of customer name along with their order details

Generated SQL:
View SQL
SELECT c.name, s.order_id, s.amount, s.product, s.created_at, s.quarter 
FROM customers c 
JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;

12 rows returned.
